comment: They offer a lot of direction and guidance, but few, if any, are willing to take it. This professor has made it known that they are available for feedback or recovery, so if anyone didn't do as well it's because they had not applied themselves.

Overall, she is not the best professor. I recommend only taking her if necessary! Her labs were ahead of the actual chemistry class I was taking, so she tried to teach it to us for 30 mins. Keyword TRIED!! We were told to do pre-calculations for a topic we haven't even learned yet. She also never showed us how or what to do! Super frustrating!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Tough grader
